name: Chibi Pet 3.0: Solar Light, Lunar Glow, and Time Rip
blurb: Chibi Pet Solar Light, Chibi Pet Lunar Glow, and Chibi Pet Time Rip are  mobile games that will let you raise cute and fun pets!

rewards.reward: - Your name on our website\r\n- Beta Access to the Battle System! Any Reward above this qualifies for this as well.
- Your name on our website\r\n- 500 Chibi Points (In game currency (around 99 Chibi Points to a US$1)\r\n- 3 Special Case Designs based off of the Solar Light, Lunar Glow, and Time Rip Title Designs
